Title: Relates to adding certain notice requirements for enforcing liens on goods in self-storage facilities and prohibiting enforcement of such liens during the COVID-19 state disaster emergency
Summary: Relates to adding certain notice requirements for enforcing liens on goods in self-storage facilities; extends the demand for payment period to 60 days; prohibits enforcement of owner's liens by public or private sale during the COVID-19 state disaster emergency.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the lien law, in relation to adding certain notice requirements for enforcing liens on goods in self-storage facilities and prohibiting enforcement of such liens during the COVID-19 state disaster emergency
